website_summaries.verdict: A top-rated foam mattress that’s a good option for any sleeper, striking the perfect balance between soft and firm, comfort and support.
pros: Scored highly for spine alignment and responsiveness, making the Leesa a great mattress choice for combination sleepers and people with low-back pain
cons: Performs best when paired with the right foundation
May not achieve optimal sleep with the wrong base

website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable foam mattress that provides support that most owners find comfortable, though some think it's too firm.
pros: Has a memory foam layer that's supportive and conforms to the natural curves of the body
Breathable top layer helps keep you cool while you sleep
cons: Some found this mattresses too firm, and a few griped about aggravated back pain after sleeping on it

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy Leesa Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the mattress in March 2017. Six months out, mattress is lumpy. We have rotated every three months as suggested, and have a frame that meets the requirements by Leesa. After contacting Leesa, they came back with I need to add more planks of wood to my bed frame. Not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Love my Leesa
customer_reviews.text: No more lower back pain since purchasing this mattress. It conforms to your shape and is cooler than my old tempurpedic mattress. I didn't find it too firm or too soft. It is just right!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: comfy but falls apart within couple months
customer_reviews.text: I only have had the mattress in use less than two months and the zip cover on the mattress is falling apart. Literally shredded. It's a comfortable mattress but is going to be in the trash in less than six months. VERY UNFORTUNATE AND VERY DISAPPOINTED. I've paid half as much for a nicer memory foam (different company)that has been in perfect condition for the last 5 years. I wouldn't recommend this brand
customer_reviews.author: sarah suppan

customer_reviews.title: Dirty and Broken
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in a plastic wrapping instead of a box, and it was dirty with a few holes. It was definitely not new, and not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Even after a year sleeping in it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have owned this mattress now for over a year and my only issue is lack of support in the edges, but that's the same with any memory foam mattress. Of the complaints I have seen about this mattress is people not knowing what they get with memory foam, all memory foam mattress, not just this one. Sleeping on it memory foam does take a little getting use to, but I wouldn't trade it for any other mattress now.
customer_reviews.author: T-BP

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable mattress that sinks after use
customer_reviews.text: My family received this mattress approximately two years ago and I could not dislike this mattress more. It is so uncomfortable I am already saving for a new mattress. Shortly after receiving this product my husbands size started to have an indentation which sags making it uncomfortable to even sit on his side for a short time let alone sleep on it. I find this mattress overall terribly uncomfortable and often I wake up with neck and back pain from sleeping on it, I wish I had my money back so I could get something else it is that uncomfortable. I would not get this mattress again.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary J.

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for side sleepers!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is super comfortable. My wife and I are both side sleepers and it took a day or two to adjust to the new feel. Now we love it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Misra

customer_reviews.title: 8 months not so strong
customer_reviews.text: Had the matteress for 8 months now.. been great since I bought it however it's starting to loose its comfort slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Wasting your money
customer_reviews.text: This bed was amazing for a couple of months. After 6 months it started to breakdown where we slept, we rotated it. It was decent for another month. It got worse, much worse. We rotated it so we slept on it sideways. It is now garbage. My back hurts every morning to the point and husband’s back hurts all night long. He’s 5’11” and 185lbs while I’m 5’8” and 130lbs. We aren’t big people. So in under a year, our xxxx$ mattress turned into more garbage for the landfills. I don’t recommend this bed unless you like to buy a new mattress every 6 months to a year.
customer_reviews.author: jaa.1385

customer_reviews.title: Awful awful awful
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace our 11 year old tempurpedic...awful awful awful! We decided to give leesa a try after reading rave reviews. The first one we ordered didn't expand properly so Amazon sent us a replacement. The replacement one also expanded unevenly. It's nice and expanded in the center of the bed, but slopes severely downward at the sides. There is absolutely no way we could keep this as our regular bed! There are also large gaps between the mattress and the foundation, as the mattress doesn't lay flat...at all! I will say, Amazon, as always, has been wonderful to work with! If I could give this negative stars, I would!
customer_reviews.author: Erin I.

customer_reviews.title: Mattress considerably worn after only a year
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for a little over a year. While I was very happy with its supportive firmness initially, I'm not finding that there's already a significant indentation in the middle of the bed — enough that you can feel yourself rolling "downhill" into the center if you try to lay on the sides around it. I'm shocked and disappointed that the mattress would compress this much over a year of use. I think it took 8 years for my previous pillow-top mattress to exhibit this kind of wear.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Complaining husband HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is extremely hard to please. He said sleeping on the Leesa gave him the best night's sleep he has had in a long time. He has back problems so being comfortable and not twisting himself due to an uncomfortable rest is very important. This product is a much cheaper alternative to mattresses which claim perfect sleep. As long as it holds up, I'd say this is provides the comfort without costing an arm and a leg.
customer_reviews.author: Cerie

customer_reviews.title: Stinks
customer_reviews.text: The smell is not going away. It’s been couple of weeks since we took it out of the box and it still spreads that horrible smell. I can’t believe this!!! I bought it for my son who has many allergies and he seem to be sensitive to this mattress too. I just ordered another mattress from a different company. I can return Leesa to Amazon but that requires me packing it again....maybe I will, it was almost 1000$, such a shame to sell mattress priced that much and it makes the whole room stink!
customer_reviews.author: Sneska

customer_reviews.title: Recommended! Great mattress, great price, and easier delivery than from the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: As with many others, I was nervous about buying a mattress online. But it was great - unlike ordering from the manufacturer, Amazon brought it in two days. Easy to unpack and set up. The first couple of days the mattress smelled slightly chemical, but it cleared up quickly. I sleep well on it. As a bonus, you can't feel another person moving around in the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Having had it for over a month now I am in love with it and so is my boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: I struggled deciding if I should get this bed or not because of the price. And it being the first mattress I was purchasing I really had no clue what I really wanted. Having had it for over a month now I am in love with it and so is my boyfriend. Great bed and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome awesome product!!! Don’t waste money on temperpoedic!!
customer_reviews.text: After getting the order straightened out because at first, my mattress was sent to someone in FL....I’ve never lived there!! I received my mattress finally. I’ve had it two years now and still LOVE it!!! Temperpoetic is overrated and costs too damn much!! Girlfriend had one and it was good, better than a regular mattress. Thought I’d roll the dice on this plus it was priced way low and I did check reviews on different websites. So happy I went with Leesa!!! I definitely recommend and I’d definitely purchase again in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremi

customer_reviews.title: Useless - After 2-years - Soft, Saggy, Squishy
customer_reviews.text: After using my King-size Leesa Mattress for two years, I must get another mattress. As others have opined, the mattress performs well during the 'review period' but degrades rapidly thereafter. It has become soft, without any meaningfull support. Shoulder, neck and back pain are unavoidable as I am effectively sleeping in a hammock. A thousand bucks (or more) is too steep for a mattress that fails to last more than two years.
customer_reviews.author: FM SFO

customer_reviews.title: So far the chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Received today. Unwrapped and filling nicely. Did not notice smell like all writing about but 30 min later when walked in room i couldnt even breathe. It is awful chemical smell. I opened windows, turned on ceiling fan and closed the door. You would think they would of come up with a way to not have this inconvenience. Giving it a few days and see what happens. Gave 3 stars so far do to smell.
customer_reviews.author: Hettie Morgan-Steinberg

customer_reviews.title: Before getting this mattress I was getting up at 5 AM to exercise and now I just don't want to get up is incredibly comfortable! I switched from a mattress that was very ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a very big problem with this mattress. Before getting this mattress I was getting up at 5 AM to exercise and now I just don't want to get up is incredibly comfortable! I switched from a mattress that was very uncomfortable but I've had the best sleep ever.
customer_reviews.author: Pier Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bed upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bed upgrade: the cover it comes with is hecking soft and seeing the bed-in-a-box expand was something else. The price is rather steep and I wish they sold the accessories like pillows and blankets on Amazon as well, but it has been great thus far. The fact they offer a long trial for the bed is amazing in itself in the event that you do not like the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jyoumae

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress but too soft
customer_reviews.text: After hearing raves from friends and online reviews, I purchased this mattress with high hopes. It's nicely designed with a comfortable surface, and the smell wasn't too bad (although a faint chemical odor lingered for two months). But having always used spring mattresses, I found this too soft. I'm a back and side sleeper and consistently woke up with noticeable back pain, which is very unusual for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Hassle Hassle Hassle Free
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Not a great mattress for me (too hot and back pain from as a side sleeper). 4 Stars for Amazon coming through on the return process. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Oh gosh. I went back and forth about ordering this mattress. How can something that comes in a box be so good? Amazing! It's as thick as our old mattress. We kept the box springs and put a sheet of plywood in between. Every morning my husband says, I LIVE this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Obar

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy for us. Amazon refunded. Love Amazon for being responsive to dissatisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: Great idea for those who cannot get to a store to buy mattress. This one did not inflate evenly. The head and foot did not expand evenly and the center did. Couldn’t sleep on it because center was high. Head and foot were low.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: If you weigh more than 150 don't buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: we wake up every morning cursing the day we bought this mattress, if you can afford a better one get a better one. this sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Person's Name

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress ever
customer_reviews.text: Best. Mattress. Ever. When we were looking at mattresses, I asked a bunch of friends and work colleagues what they had. Didn't want to spend thousands on a tempur pedic, but wanted a similar feel. Co-worked said they had this bed and loved it, so bought it to try it out. It is awesome!!! I've never slept better.
customer_reviews.author: B. Evans

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!! WILL NOT LAST!
customer_reviews.text: Stay far away! The mattress wears terribly after 2 years with sagging in the center making it practically unusable. Sleeping with a partner is unbearable as the mattress will sag over an inch. Contacted the manufacturer to explain the problem only for them to ask for picture evidence with a literal measuring tape that the sag measured over an inch and a half. Jumped through all kinds of hoops such as getting a full sized bed wooden board underneath, and the sag was still unbearable. For reference I’m a 150 pound man and my partner is about 115 pounds. Worst purchase I’ve ever made. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It was sturdy for a month then slowly it started breaking down and sinks everytime.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special, No Noticable Improvement
customer_reviews.text: Just feels like every other foam mattress I've slept on, whether it's from Ikea or another store. Doesn't feel like an improvement over a futon, which is really not impressive. Don't think it's particularly cooling, either. Not sure why I fell for the marketing. Still have some time in my trial period, so we'll see if it's worth the hassle of returning and going mattress shopping again.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong size....twice
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased a mattress from Leesa directly and was replacing another mattress. The mattresses are very comfortable and relieved back pain experienced from an old mattress. The low rating is for this particular listing. I ordered a full and received a twin size. Item was re-shipped and it was a twin again. Save yourself time and hassle and just order directly from the manufacturer, who will actually send you the correct item.
customer_reviews.author: C P.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed! 7 months later
customer_reviews.text: Great bed! 7 months later, still love it. Finding less expensive fitted sheets that fit were a struggle though because the mattress is only 10". Most sheets were deep pockets and becomes loose when you put it on. :-( Just a warning, make sure you have help moving the box and mattress. It's really heavy.
customer_reviews.author: VT Pooh Bear

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, but takes a while to break in.
customer_reviews.text: Upgrading from an older box spring and it is super comfortable especially for a mostly side sleeper. However it does take some time to break in and there was a smell for a while, so wanted to take some time before rating. I've had it for 2 months now and at first I thought it was too firm, but now it feels great. Don't get sucked in to a cheaper mattress, but unable to try it out safely for 100 days. Great mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Sean S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress!!
customer_reviews.text: My partner and I have been obsessing over a new mattress for our bedroom remodel. We tried to find and test as many of the home delivery “mattress in a box” options that we could. We found this at our local west elm store, where we purchased our new bed from as well. The Leesa was a clear front runner in terms of comfort and convenience. This mattress is amazing and I cannot remember the last time I had such great sleep - my only conplaint(?) is that it appears that the corners are still a little squished down after a few weeks. It is not an interference of quality, but it’s more of an aesthetic thing for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How much would you pay for night after night of fabulous sleep
customer_reviews.text: This mattress, oh this mattress. It is dangerously comfortable. We just ordered another one for our guest room. Not sure I want guest to stay that long. When you go to sleep on a Leesa, you will have to convince yourself to get out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, afraid of getting another mattress to firm and got one that was too soft
customer_reviews.text: It might work well on a platform bed, however I bought it for and her justable frame and I feel like the mattress is too thin that I can feel the frame through the mattress. It’s more comfortable than my last nitrous but not nearly as comfortable as the discontinued original Tempur-pedic
customer_reviews.author: Erin B 10/16

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Leesa mattress we bought this for our rental . It’s very comfortable and easy to sleep on in any position . It feels like you fit right into the mattress it’s perfect !
customer_reviews.author: sanjen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but quality issues with cover
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for just over a year. It is a very comfortable mattress. I do still occasionally wake up with some back pain but it's greatly reduced and I do not find the mattress hot. The problem I've had with mine is the seam is tearing where the material changes color along the stripe. It doesn't seem like this should be a problem just over a year in.
customer_reviews.author: Kristoni

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: So far mattress has performed as expected. I have not experienced any difference between being hotter or cooler than my last mattress. Easy to setup box can be heavy going upstairs. Enjoyed so far with no real complaints. I bought a King size coming from a sleep number queen. Sleep number bed was great, no real complaints but very expensive for what it truly is. The price for this Leesa mattress is fair for what it is performs just as well so far and I sleep just as well as I did before.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Leesa mattress!
customer_reviews.text: The Leesa mattress is simply wonderful to sleep on. I was nervous to order through Amazon, but we were fully satisfied by the delivery and the mattress we received. It's a nice mix of firm and soft. The cooling layer makes for a comfortable night of sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Phillips

customer_reviews.title: The mattress is cool, it's amazingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: After 5 nights on this mattress, I am in awe. I have never slept so well, slept so solid and not moved through the night. The mattress is cool, it's amazingly comfortable, soft and supportive. I'll buy another one with no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Ogg

customer_reviews.title: This mattress has been the best purchase of the last decade of my life
customer_reviews.text: This mattress has been the best purchase of the last decade of my life. I know everyone sleeps differently, so take it as you will, but I have had chronic lower back pain every morning for the past ten years. It didn't matter where I slept, and standard foam mattresses didn't help; I would always wake up, barely able to move, and have to literally roll out of bed. After only 3-4 nights sleeping on this mattress, I woke up with zero pain. Literally none. It was a stunning and life-altering change. I don't like to dramatize, but seriously, it changed how I live my day.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R Ray

customer_reviews.title: We've had it for about 4 months now and have nothing but wonderful things to say
customer_reviews.text: This mattress rocks! No more back and neck pain for my husband. We noticed a massive difference from day one of sleeping on it. We've had it for about 4 months now and have nothing but wonderful things to say. Highly recommend The Leesa mattress as it's well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: LisaM

customer_reviews.title: Slight padding on a brick
customer_reviews.text: Good quality VERY HARD mattress. If you don't like more than a few inches of firm padding to sleep on, this is the one for you! I'm not sure how they can advertise it "hugging" your body. I have sore ribs still after trying it for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Second Leesa
customer_reviews.text: I have a Leesa queen mattress and my son finally convinced me to get him one. We love our Leesa mattresses. Even the animals prefer to sleep on our beds now! My back no longer hurts in the morning and my son sleeps through the night. Well worth the price and in our opinion sleeps better than the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: KaseyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love the Leesa!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my new Leesa mattress! I have been sleeping on the Leesa for two months now and it’s been a dream. Before switching over I woke up every day with lower back pain and could not get comfortable. Since I’ve had my leesa I haven’t had back pain and have slept much better often sleeping through the night, which is new for me.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Extra firm
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I ordered this to replace a Temprpedic thinking we would save a few bucks. First its outgas stage lasted weeks. Second firm is an understatement I've slept on rugs with better support. Third the edges are mush careful you'll fall off.. true story. Fourth the entire bed seemed to have a dome shape even placed on the floor assuming the base had an issue always felt the sensation of inversion. On to the good, Amazon made the return process painless.
customer_reviews.author: Roslyn Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: At the insistence of our kids we bought this King sized mattress and are we ever glad we did! This mattress is comfortable, supportive and a pleasure to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get the negative reviews here. I love this mattress - not too soft, not too firm. It also does not trap heat in the summertime. Had it for a year now and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: It’s an ok mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was great but here it is two years later, starting a year from when we purchased it, it seems that it’s overly soft and you end up rolling to the center.
customer_reviews.author: Basi

customer_reviews.title: Soft but supportive
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattresss. It is somehow firm and soft at the same time. I cannot stand a hard mattress that creates pressure points on my hips and knees and shoulders. The Leesa is firm but sinks where you need it to in order to relieve any pressure. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dana K. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Major back pain from a cheap mattress
customer_reviews.text: Our leesa is 3 years old now and we desperately need to get a new mattress. The most ridiculous part is that we only use it in the summertime as it’s at a second home, so that would mean less than a years usage. It’s sagging in the middle and we both wake up every morning with Terrible back pain. It’s so uncomfortable. I could have found a better mattress for around the same price, I strongly do not recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: heat trapper but very comfy
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is really comfortable. Had it for about a year now. This is not the bed for someone who likes a firm/ more support type of mattress. I sink right into it and it’s very soft but that’s what we were looking for so it works great for the price and setting it up was easy. I will say, if you’re a person that gets hot at night this bed also might not be for you, I feel like the foam or whatever material of the mattress is traps heat like no other.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna R.

customer_reviews.title: Very firm mattress
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and returned this mattress. I'm giving it 5 stars because the mattress is described as firm and that was my only issue. Too firm, couldn't get comfortable, gave me some back/should pain. If you like firm you'll enjoy this. If you prefer medium or soft do not test this mattress. I slept on it for 9 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Started great, after about a year its awful
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I loved this mattress when we bought it, but after almost 2 years it is garbage. It started out so promising after about a week of getting used to it. I have rotated it every 3 or 4 monthes, but there is a giant valley on both sides where we sleep. We started noticing the sinking about a year in which was well past the 100 day warrenty. At this point I in a situation where we are having to buy a new mattress after 2 years. Very dissatisfied in how it has held up.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kearney

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and it dips where you sleep
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for almost 4 years now and it's still comfortable, BUT there is a rise in the middle since no one sleeps in the middle. Therefore, if my wife and I ever try to get closer, you can't because of this hump that has formed. The mattress creates a dip over time where you sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Fridman

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress around
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress. My husband and I are large people who move around at night seance we got this mattress we sleep all night threw. Thank you for the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy.
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this thing. Very comfortable and was so easy to get and setup. On the firmer side of mattresses, but I cannot feel my wife when she moves, and vice versa. Incredible. We like to call it "dangerous", because we don't want to get out of bed anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Well worth the money. Have been looking for a new mattress and after much research I chose this. Better sleep even with physical issues which makes the days go better. Couldn't be happier.

customer_reviews.text: We have had this mattress for about a month and see an improvement in our backs and sleep. Glad we finally made the leap. Sleep is so important!

customer_reviews.text: We’ve had ours for several years and have no problems whatsoever. It is comfortable it sleeps well and we love it
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Nieting

customer_reviews.text: Great mattress. Off-gassing lingers a little long but overall it has really been great to sleep on. My wife and I are both average size people and this was perfect for us.

customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this the best sleep in a long time sooooooo comfy love Recommend

customer_reviews.title: My husband like a hard mattress

I can get up to take care of our twins in the middle of the night without him even realizing I've left the bed. Not so with our old spring mattress. Also, the price was great compared to Leesa's actual website. We did a ton of research before buying, and we allowed the recommendation of a dear friend to sway us to the Leesa instead of the Purple. I'm so glad we did. You will sleep like a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ayaz

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: No more box springs! just unroll and relax. i never would have thought a bed in a box would be comfortable, thought about using it in my guest room. Now it is my main bed!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mattress
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic bed. Incredible, have had no issues and I have had it for several months at this point.

customer_reviews.title: Poor attention to basic detail
customer_reviews.text: The bed arrived half opened. Not even in a box. I’m not sure if mold got into it, but if definitely came badly stained. I’m highly disappointed in the quality of customer care. People are using this to sleep on, basic hygiene isn’t something that should be compromised.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Farber

customer_reviews.title: It's like the bed hugs you
customer_reviews.text: I love love LOVE this bed. I sleep so good at night now and wake up super refreshed! Best mattress I have ever owned.

customer_reviews.title: Firm, supportive and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy setup and comfortable from night one. A great mattress!

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress for medium to large sleepers.
customer_reviews.text: Firm, supportive mattress. Not sure if it's the best of all the new Internet Mattresses. But it is an improvement over my 10 year old spring mattress. The key is to rotate it every single month (at least) or it will start to compress, leaving a low spot that doesn't support your spine. Some petite people (close to 100 pounds) report that it's too firm, and their bodies don't sink into it. Some very large people (280 pounds and up) report that it doesn't support their weight. Is it better than all the other trendy mattresses? It's a matter of personal taste. You HAVE to try them out to find out what works best for your body.
